title: Soupy Noodles
description: A warm and comforting bowl of savory goodness that wraps you in a cozy embrace.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, beans, etc.), thinly sliced
steps: Cook noodles according to package instructions, drain, and set aside.
In a pot, heat vegetable oil and saut√© garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry for a few minutes.
Pour in vegetable broth, soy sauce, and sesame oil. Season with salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil and simmer for 10-15 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Divide cooked noodles into serving bowls and ladle the hot soup over them.
Garnish with spring onions and serve your Soupy Noodles.

title: Veg Manchurian
description: Irresistible veggie balls, drenched in a flavorful sauce, make for the perfect Indo-Chinese fusion.
ingredients: For the sauce: 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon chili sauce, 1 tablespoon ketchup, 1/2 teaspoon vinegar, 1/2 teaspoon sugar
steps: In a bowl, mix grated cabbage, grated carrot, chopped capsicum, chopped spring onions, all-purpose flour, cornflour, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, chili sauce, salt, and pepper.
Shape the mixture into small balls and deep fry until golden brown. Drain excess oil and set aside.
In a separate pan, heat a little oil. Add soy sauce, chili sauce, ketchup, vinegar, and sugar to make the sauce.
Toss the fried vegetable balls in the sauce until well coated. Serve your Veg Manchurian.

title: Momos
description: Delicate parcels of joy, each bite is a burst of flavorful surprises, perfect for sharing with loved ones.
ingredients: Dipping sauce: soy sauce, vinegar, and chili
steps: In a bowl, mix all-purpose flour with enough water to make a smooth dough. Cover and let it rest for 30 minutes.
In another bowl, mix ground chicken or vegetables, chopped onion, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, salt, and pepper to make the filling.
Roll out small portions of the dough into thin circles. Place a spoonful of filling in the center and fold to form dumplings. Seal the edges.
Steam the momos for about 15-20 minutes until cooked through.
Serve your Momos hot with a dipping sauce made of soy sauce, vinegar, and chili sauce.

title: Chicken Manchurian
description: Tender chicken bites in a lip-smacking sauce, it's a tantalizing blend of flavors that keeps you craving for more.
ingredients: 200 grams boneless chicken, cut into small pieces
For the sauce: 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon chili sauce, 1 tablespoon ketchup, 1/2 teaspoon vinegar, 1/2 teaspoon sugar
steps: In a bowl, mix all-purpose flour, cornflour, egg, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, chili sauce, salt, and pepper to make a batter.
Dip chicken pieces in the batter and deep fry until golden brown. Drain excess oil and set aside.
In a separate pan, heat a little oil. Add soy sauce, chili sauce, ketchup, vinegar, and sugar to make the sauce.
Toss the fried chicken pieces in the sauce until well coated. Serve your Chicken Manchurian.
